Do you have thick nasal discharge that is yellow or green?
Include a photo of your nasal discharge
How have you felt the flow of nasal discharge from your nose in the last few days?
(Select one number from 1 to 5 that best matches your condition)
A little discharge, but not flowing out
Discharge flows quite a lot forward or to the back of the throat (post-nasal drip)
Discharge flows very much and continuously, feels disturbing (both forward and backward)
A little nasal discharge, but not flowing out
Nasal discharge flows quite a lot forward or down the throat (post-nasal drip)
Nasal discharge flows very much and continuously, feels disturbing (forward or backward)
Do you feel pain or pressure on your face?
(select 1 if there are no symptoms at all and 5 if the pain is severe)
Have you experienced a high fever recently?
(choose 1 if there is no fever at all and 5 if the fever is higher than 39°C)
Do you experience nasal congestion or a feeling of fullness in your nose?
(select 1 if there is no difficulty at all and 5 if the nasal congestion or fullness is very severe)
How long have your symptoms lasted?
Do you experience any other symptoms not mentioned in the previous questions?
